reviewText: I enjoyed the story of the development of the horse Jappeloup and how Pierre had to grow to trust in him as well as trust his own riding skills. The jumping rounds that were shown from the Olympics and other events were quite exciting, It was interesting how they were able to show the footage along with the actors that played the parts of Pierre , Jappeloup's groom, and his teammates. The addition of Pierre's family story made it a very human and believable.
Great movie. The attention to detail of the actual events is amazing.

DVD+Blueray Package great!

No support for foreign languages, no english subtitles. If you do not speak french don't buy it.
As usual a Guiliaume Canet winner.
As a show jumper myself, I loved every second of it. And even though I knew the final outcome I was still on the edge of my seat the entire time. Highly recommend for fellow horse people.
great movie
On the caliber of national velvet!

Okay horse people! This movie is for you! It was beautiful! And based off a true story about a very special horse that jumps in the Olympics, and the passion his owner had for for jumping horses. Warning! There will be a few crying spouts thru it! Enjoy ! Because I sure did.

Realistic and Beautiful, the  cinematography was gorgeous. We had English subtitles and being a avid reader anyways I enjoyed this foreign film with no issues. You can tell this film was a big endeavor, no detail was to small. From the time correct vet equipment (X-Ray machine) to the exact jumps used in the Olympics, it was precise.
Awesome movie
I don't like subtitled movies but I enjoyed this one.
This is a English subtitled movie and we were concerned about renting a subtitled movie but the story is based on a true life story and we enjoyed the movie tremendously subtitles and all!
My new favorite movie :)
very realistic riding scenes. extremely well done.

Well written. The movie had a good "A"and "B" story lines.  Extremely well directed and filmed.  The action was realistic., which is a challenge when the story requires jumping a horse at "Olympic" level.  Bravo!
Great Movie. For all the family. Gives good lessons if life. Gives hints of what the life of a horse rider and a riding school are. Really great movie. Great actors

I enjoyed the complexity of this movie along with some of the best equine cinematography I have ever seen.  Equestrians will enjoy and relate.  Most of all it is a story about evolving relationships: parent/child, rider/horse, husband/wife, coach/athlete.... It is a long movie and could be watched in 3 segments.
As a horseperson I enjoyed this movie and got past the sub-titles.  It has a high production value, very good acting and and nice story line.  Much better than anything Hollywood produces today.
excellent french film
It is an excellent film. Estimate like friendship, love, loyalty and honesty plows put in relevance within to history of a wonderful horse and his owner.
Great movie that really captures the story in a very real way.
Great true story for horse lovers with a happy ending.

Absolutely wonderful movie. The acting is very good, so it's easy to follow along with even if you're not the fastest subtitle reader. The riding is all very accurate and for the most part, so is the attire of the era. A lot of attention to detail went into this movie. It isn't just for horse lovers either. The story of the human condition is one we can all relate to.
